channel.title: Moparscape says my server is Offline
channel.description: So, When I try to post my server on Moparscape server checker, It says I can't post i becaause it is offline. But its not offline so i dont understand.. Please help :(

item.title: Moparscape says my server is Offline
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“Qold, post:7, topic:551337”][quote author=Zymus link=topic=670252.msg4482016#msg4482016 date=1430784053]
If canyouseeme.org says it can’t see you, it means it’s not forwarded correctly.
You’ll need to set it on the router, open it on the firewall, and make sure you have a static IP to your router.
[/quote]

Can you go through step by step on how to do that? Please[/quote]
There are countless tutorials all over the internet on how to port forward, there are literally guides designed to teach newbies step by step on how to get a server running.

To be honest, if you don’t even know how to port forward you shouldn’t be making a RSPS in the first place.

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape says my server is Offline

item.title: Moparscape says my server is Offline
item.dc:creator: @Qold Qold
item.description:
@Qold wrote:

[quote=“Zymus, post:6, topic:551337”]If canyouseeme.org says it can’t see you, it means it’s not forwarded correctly.
You’ll need to set it on the router, open it on the firewall, and make sure you have a static IP to your router.[/quote]

Can you go through step by step on how to do that? Please

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape says my server is Offline
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If canyouseeme.org says it can’t see you, it means it’s not forwarded correctly.
You’ll need to set it on the router, open it on the firewall, and make sure you have a static IP to your router.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape says my server is Offline

item.description:

Zymus:

IS your port on the status page set to 43595?

Yes it is
